medical_history.chief_complaint: Multiple pruritic skin lesions of 15 years duration.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 15 years ago and have progressively developed into multiple pruritic lesions. The patient experienced symptomatic extrasystole during physical or emotional stress, sporadic flushing, and anaphylaxis after an insect bite.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Endoscopic diagnosis of chronic gastritis with a positive culture for Helicobacter pylori.
medical_history.family_history: The monozygotic twin brother has similar cutaneous lesions and a history of asthma since early childhood. No other significant family medical history reported.
